amendatorysection.catchline: Stone Office Building; Department of Administrative Services; Department of Health and Human Services; limitations.
amendatorysection.para: Until June 30, 1993, the Department of Administrative Services shall be limited to the same rental rate on the Stone Office Building at the Norfolk Regional Center as existed on January 1, 1992. The Department of Health and Human Services shall be limited to reimbursement from the counties maintaining office space in the Stone Office Building pursuant to section 68-130 in the same amount such counties paid for rental of such space on January 1, 1992.
